name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The head of Okarin-in Temple of Kodaiji Temple in Kyoto, Japan: Last December, he found a Chinese photographer taking photos of other tourists in the forbidden area of the temple, and there was a notice of "No Commercial Photography" in the area. He went up to remind him, but the other party threatened in poor Japanese: "You will soon become part of China, so arrogant, be careful to be destroyed!" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjriYBbbMAAdiHj.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 12, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A man interviewed a parent of a Shenzhen international school about his views on China's rote learning. The parent believes that Chinese education is a selective education that cannot inspire children's creativity. Children cannot have their own independent ideas and cannot question power and the existing system. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890074449447436288/pu/img/CwKFYOEsBcNCzFYZ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Dalian, Liaoning. A lawyer said that on January 10, two plainclothes policemen from Henan and a local policeman came to the home of the client, Li Moumou, and forcibly took Li Moumou away without showing any documents.
After being rejected, the Henan police claimed that the client was a criminal suspect without any evidence and wanted to summon him, and the police summons was blank. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890080309145923584/pu/img/3amBWAkx7uFCp9bI.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 13, Jiangxi. A man said that he had donated 3,800 ml of blood before, and his brother and nephew donated more than 4,000 ml of blood in total.
Recently, his mother was seriously ill and needed blood for surgery, but the hospital told him that he had to donate blood in the near future to get blood supply. In order for his mother's surgery to go smoothly, the man and his family had no choice but to go to the blood station again to donate blood. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890084028881281024/pu/img/wv2qrKaxMJFYD3Xu.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 12, "Nucleic Acid King" Zhang Hezi posted a video of himself riding in the business class of a high-speed train on his Douyin account. This showed the outside world that he was not subject to restrictions on high consumption.
In the video, Zhang Hezi asked back: Is this high consumption? Then I want to report myself.
Netizens reported to the court in the comment area.
https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890103023768334339/pu/img/qjFduu6AmRaRww_2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contribution: Comparison of the old and new first-grade Chinese textbooks: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjsN-0eacAM7hjD.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to http://611Study.ICU, among the 2,137 schools currently on the list, 45.5% of them have experienced student suicides.
Among them, 58.8% of schools in Henan had student suicides in 2024, 54.3% in Jiangsu, and 51.9% in Shanxi.
In terms of quantity, Shandong has 271 people and 97 schools; Henan has 269 people and 114 schools; Jiangsu has 216 people and 82 schools; Hebei has 205 people and 74 schools; Guangdong has 185 and 85 schools; Shanxi has 184 people and 55 schools
